raw_body:
Hey HN, I am Zuhaib from Magicnode (https://magicnode.ai), no code AI micro apps builder platform visually with workflows. 
Here is the demo video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pIecK6uKZjU&t=4s&ab_channel=...
With Magicnode, you can:
Build AI apps visually — drag, drop, and connect “nodes” for prompts, logic, APIs, and UI elements.
Publish instantly — your app becomes a shareable web link with a clean interface, no deployment headaches.
Monetize & share — there’s an “App Store” where you can publish your AI tools for others to use, free or paid.
Go beyond chatbots — workflows can handle structured inputs, multi-step logic, file processing, and integrations.
Example: In under 10 minutes, a non-technical marketer made a “viral TikTok caption generator” that uses OpenAI + a trending-hashtag API, and shared it with their whole team.
We’re hoping Magicnode lowers the barrier for creators, small businesses, and indie hackers who want to build AI products fast — without hiring developers or wrangling cloud deployments.
Would love your feedback on:
What use cases you’d want to see
Gaps we should close to make it useful for power users
Features that would make you actually switch from code to visual building
Note: We applied to YC F25 but didn’t get in as of now — still excited to share what we’ve built and get feedback.
We’re live now — try it here: magicnode.ai
Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=44917760
Points: 2
# Comments: 0
speedrun: Magicnode is a no-code platform that enables users to build AI micro apps visually by connecting nodes for prompts, logic, and APIs. This innovation allows non-technical users to create and publish AI applications quickly, democratizing access to AI development and potentially transforming how small businesses and creators approach app creation.
why_it_matters: Magicnode empowers non-technical users to create AI applications without needing coding skills, fostering innovation among small businesses and individual creators.
The platform's instant publishing and monetization features can disrupt traditional app development models, offering new revenue streams for users and enhancing the accessibility of AI tools.

lenses.eli12: Magicnode lets anyone build AI apps easily by dragging and dropping elements. It's exciting because it means you don’t need to know how to code to create useful tools. This can help small businesses and individuals share their ideas quickly and simply.
lenses.pm: Magicnode targets creators, small businesses, and marketers who need to develop AI solutions without technical expertise. It solves the problem of complex app development by simplifying the process, offering a competitive edge in the growing AI market. However, businesses must consider the risks of relying on a no-code platform for critical applications.
lenses.engineer: Magicnode employs a visual programming approach, allowing users to connect various nodes for functionality. Its architecture supports integrations with APIs and structured data handling, but it may face limitations in scalability and performance for more complex applications. Additionally, the reliance on a visual interface could restrict advanced customizations.
